title: ICICI Bank to target self-employed, scale up its private banking to build deposit base
description: ICICI Bank plans to focus on the self-employed, private banking, and family offices to boost deposits. They saw potential in increasing client wallet share. The bank reported 15.1% growth in total deposits for the June quarter and is carefully monitoring risks, particularly in SME and unsecured segments.
